read_dict_wtc_engine_model(engine)

Reads BADA4 list of ac types and create a dictionary with synonims ac according to BADA3 and which is their wake and engine type.
read_dict_wtc_engine_model(engine)¶

Reads BADA4 list of ac types and create a dictionary with synonims ac according to BADA3 and which is their wake and engine type.

In BADA4 aircraft are identified by ac_model.

Mercury
